metadata.Title: CVE-2022-21222 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The package css-what before 2.1.3 are vulnerable to Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS) due to the usage of insecure regular expression in the re_attr variable of index.js. The exploitation of this vulnerability could be triggered via the parse function.

criterions.comment: node-css-what: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
